abstract: Although the nation’s largest cellphone service added fewer customers in the first quarter, its customers paid to watch videos, use the Web or play music on their smartphones and tablets.
snippet: Although the nation’s largest cellphone service added fewer customers in the first quarter, its customers paid to watch videos, use the Web or play music on their smartphones and tablets.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Wireless, the nation’s largest cellphone service, on Thursday reported that in the first three months of the year fewer customers joined its service compared with the same period last year.

headline.main: Mobile Data Service Fees Help Bolster Profit at Verizon
headline.print_headline: Mobile Data Service Fees Help Bolster Profit at Verizon
